name: Kids Card Creator: Personal Ecards for Little ones
name_original: Kids Card Creator: Personal Ecards for Little ones
description:
Quackart Studios is continuously growing by making interactive and engaging games for Kids. We have received immense love from Parents and Kids from different countries and we thank you all your love and gratitude.

Like us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/pages/quackartstudios
Follow us on twitter: @quackartstudios
Visit us : http://www.quackart-studios.com
YouTube channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/QuackartStudios
Email us at : quackartstudios@gmail.com

Your Feedback is very important for us. Please rate/review our apps/games so that we keep on delivering good games in future.

Thank you :)
Quackart Studios Team
